note:
Making a history for a post-historical self.

Profile image: selfie of a brown 20-something femme with short black hair and dark eyes, wearing a green 'nightie' (in the local parlance) and holding the Rosebud Tarot by Diana Rose Harper and Amanda Lee Stilwell, against a peach pink and brown background, smiling at the camera.

Header image: closeup of a cluster of curry tree buds blooming into little star-like white flowers, against a backdrop of young warm-toned green curry leaves.
